argument.description: Values that must be either 0 or 1. They represent bits in a bit vector.

returnType: The BIN_TO_NUM function returns a numeric value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL BIN_TO_NUM function converts a bit vector to a number.
sample:
BIN_TO_NUM(1)
Result: 1

BIN_TO_NUM(1,0)
Result: 2

BIN_TO_NUM(1,1)
Result: 3

BIN_TO_NUM(1,1,1,0)
Result: 14

BIN_TO_NUM(1,1,1,1)
Result: 15
